title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 35.1 - Development of methods to reduce trauma to child witnesses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 35.1 - Development of methods to reduce trauma to child witnesses

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator of the Courts shall
consult with individuals, agencies and groups concerned with child psychology
and child welfare and, based upon that consultation, shall develop and
implement methods and techniques designed to reduce significantly the trauma to
child witnesses likely to be caused by testifying in court proceedings. The

Chief Administrator shall periodically review such methods and techniques to
ensure their continuing effectiveness. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
35.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
